summary.para: Contains platform-agnostic classes and interfaces that allow you to configure your application in the fluent API-based application builder.
Extends the interface with a method to add the Business Class Library Customization Module to your application.

member.name: M:DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.BusinessClassLibraryCustomizationApplicationBuilderExtensions.AddBusinessClassLibraryCustomization``1(DevExpress.ExpressApp.ApplicationBuilder.IModuleBuilder{``0})

summary.para: Adds the Business Class Library Customization Module to your application.

member.param: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
member.returns: Allows you to register and configure Modules in your application, and chain further Module registrations.
